data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Thursday, February 09, 2023 has considered and approved the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, amongst other matters.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Proceeding Of The Board Meeting Held On February 09, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 read along with Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting on February 09, 2023, have inter alia approved the Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, together with Auditors Report thereon, also enclosing the Press Release on the financial results.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended September 30, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis, for the half year ended September 30, 2022.
